title: MTV stars Cory Wharton and Taylor Selfridge are expecting their first child together
text:
He's soon to become a father of two.

And Cory Wharton was overjoyed to announce through Us Weekly that girlfriend Taylor Selfridge is expecting their first child.

The 28-year-old MTV star shared in the baby joy on Instagram with a lengthy caption explaining that Taylor's pregnancy 'was definitely a surprise.'

Blessed: Cory Wharton was overjoyed to announce through Us Weekly that girlfriend Taylor Selfridge is expecting their first child

'I’ve been debating on what to say and how to exactly say it, and I found that I just want to talk from the heart quick,' he wrote to his nearly one million followers. 'I’m excited to say that YES Taylor is pregnant!!!! Ryder is going to be a big sister.'

Cory has been back on MTV airwaves as a supportive co-parent to daughter Ryder, two, with new Teen Mom OG castmember Cheyenne Floyd.

The pair met while filming The Challenge: Rivals III, which aired on MTV in 2016, and had a brief fling which resulted in Cheyenne's pregnancy, but she kept the news a secret until Ryder was roughly six months old.

Taylor and Cory met in Hawaii while filming Ex on The Beach in 2018 (she was a part of the MTV family by way of Are You The One?)

Congrats! The 28-year-old MTV star shared in the baby joy on Instagram with a lengthy caption explaining that Taylor's pregnancy 'was definitely a surprise'

Making it work: Cory has been back on MTV airwaves as a supportive co-parent to daughter Ryder, two, with new Teen Mom OG castmember Cheyenne Floyd

New normal: The blended family have worked together to ensure that Ryder gets all the support she needs

'I also wanted to let you guys know that we weren’t trying to have a baby right now, but sometimes God puts things into your life that you don’t really understand at the time but it’s always turns out to be a bigger blessing,' he added in the caption.

'I’m really excited to share this journey with you guys. All that I ask from you guys is respect for Taylor, respect for me and most importantly respect for the baby.

'All that I want is a healthy baby that is brought into a very positive environment and surround by good energy and love.The same way that I am raising Ryder.'

He wrote that he 'never' would have thought he'd have two children 'by 28,' but he's excited for the new journey.
description: The 28-year-old MTV star shared in the baby joy on Instagram with a lengthy caption explaining that Taylor's pregnancy 'was definitely a surprise.'
